org.apache.cassandra.io

Interface IVersionedSerializer<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    RepairMessage.MessageSerializer<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnticompactionRequest.AnticompactionRequestSerializer, BooleanSerializer, BootStrapper.StringSerializer, CleanupMessage.CleanupMessageSerializer, Commit.CommitSerializer, CounterMutation.CounterMutationSerializer, EchoMessage.EchoMessageSerializer, HintMessage.Serializer, IntervalTree.Serializer, MerkleTree.MerkleTreeSerializer, MerkleTrees.MerkleTreesSerializer, MigrationManager.MigrationsSerializer, Mutation.MutationSerializer, NodePair.NodePairSerializer, PrepareMessage.PrepareMessageSerializer, PrepareResponse.PrepareResponseSerializer, RepairMessage.RepairMessageSerializer, SnapshotMessage.SnapshotMessageSerializer, StreamRequest.StreamRequestSerializer, StreamSummary.StreamSummarySerializer, SyncRequest.SyncRequestSerializer, TruncateResponse.TruncateResponseSerializer, UUIDSerializer, ValidationRequest.ValidationRequestSerializer, WriteResponse.Serializer

    public interface IVersionedSerializer<T>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      T deserialize(DataInputPlus in, int version)
      Deserialize into the specified DataInputStream instance.

      Serialize the specified type into the specified DataOutputStream instance.

    • Method Detail

      • serialize

        void serialize(T t,
               DataOutputPlus out,
               int version)
        throws java.io.IOException
        Serialize the specified type into the specified DataOutputStream instance.
        Parameters:
        t - type that needs to be serialized
        out - DataOutput into which serialization needs to happen.
        version - protocol version
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if serialization fails

      • deserialize

        T deserialize(DataInputPlus in,
              int version)
       throws java.io.IOException
        Deserialize into the specified DataInputStream instance.
        Parameters:
        in - DataInput from which deserialization needs to happen.
        version - protocol version
        Returns:
        the type that was deserialized
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if deserialization fails

      • serializedSize

        long serializedSize(T t,
                    int version)
        Calculate serialized size of object without actually serializing.
        Parameters:
        t - object to calculate serialized size
        version - protocol version
        Returns:
        serialized size of object t
